episode_summary: This episode covers a variety of quirky and intriguing topics, including a Star Wars costume designer who created a moose suit for scientists, Switzerland's unique political system with multiple ex-presidents, a New Zealand scientist's innovative method to search for the Loch Ness monster using eDNA, and the fascinating fact that the human liver grows and shrinks by 40% every day.

facts.fact: One of the costume designers on Star Wars also made a moose suit for scientists to help them sneak up on moose.
A New Zealand scientist is planning to hunt for the Loch Ness monster inside of a cup.
Your liver grows and shrinks by 40% every 24 hours.
